title: 5-year-old girl accidentally shot by brother, authorities say
content:
RANKIN COUNTY, Miss. —
A 5-year-old girl was hospitalized Thursday after an accidental shooting, Rankin County authorities said.
The girl’s older brother fired a gun at a home on Perez Cove Road, which is between Braxton and Puckett, authorities said.
The girl was flown to the University of Mississippi Medical Center. Authorities said she is expected to recover.
